Metadata.Title: Use Platform Features to Manage Keys Where Possible
Metadata.DirectLink: Use Platform Features to Manage Keys Where Possible
Metadata.Priority: J.D. Meier, Jason Taylor, Prashant Bansode, Carlos Farre, Madhu Sundararajan, Rob Boucher, Steve Gregersen

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • Microsoft® Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 3.5
  • Microsoft Visual Studio® 2008

What to Do

Use platform features where possible to avoid managing keys yourself.

How

For example, by using DPAPI, the encryption key is derived from an account’s password, so Windows handles this for you.

Additional Resources

  • For more information on using DPAPI, see “How To: Encrypt Configuration Sections in ASP.NET 2.0 Using DPAPI” at http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms998280.aspx

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
